trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa el tipo de evento que se ha producido en tiempo de diseño en una vista de un control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto se proporciona al diseñador de componentes por el host de diseño, por ejemplo [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], al generar un evento causado por alguna acción del usuario en la vista en tiempo de diseño de un control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento está controlado por un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar el método, que toma un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> clase es un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar método compara la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad para el método estático <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qué tipo de acción que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, se genera un evento en las siguientes circunstancias:

trans-unit.source: You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hacer clic en una región en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El diseñador dibuja un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: Entra o sale de modo para un control de edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un delegado predeterminado para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles personalizados reemplazan los <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para procesar los eventos del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El host del diseñador inicializa un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para el tipo de acción en la superficie de diseño y, a continuación, envía el objeto a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica qué tipo de acción:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad proporciona los argumentos del evento que son específicos del tipo de acción.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Indica que se ha provocado un evento de vista por haber hecho clic con el mouse en una región del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar método compara la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad para el método estático <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qué tipo de acción que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> es igual al objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> para indicar que ha hecho clic en una región en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un valor predeterminado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si el tipo de evento es <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, las llamadas al delegado la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase invalidación el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método para controlar los eventos click en una región en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Los argumentos de evento indican qué regiones del diseñador se hizo clic, si existe.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Indica que se ha provocado un evento de vista por dibujar un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar método compara la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad para el método estático <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qué tipo de acción que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> es igual al objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> para indicar un evento de dibujo en el control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un valor predeterminado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si el tipo de evento es <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, las llamadas al delegado la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase invalidación el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método para controlar los eventos click en una región en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Indica que se ha producido un evento de vista por cambiar el modo de plantilla de un diseñador de controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar método compara la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad para el método estático <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qué tipo de acción que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> es igual al objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> para indicar que cambian el modo de edición de plantillas para un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un valor predeterminado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si el tipo de evento es <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, el delegado establece el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Los diseñadores personalizados que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> clase puede invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> método para realizar un procesamiento adicional cuando lo cambios para un control en la superficie de diseño del modo de edición de plantillas.
